website_summaries.verdict: A mineral-based bb cream that provides medium coverage without irritating sensitive skin.
pros: Gives coverage that's somewhere between medium and full
Mineral-based bb cream that soothes the skin with aloe, green tea and honey
Nice finish that's not cakey or dewy
SPF level varies between 17 and 25, depending upon the shade
cons: Not all shades deliver the same level of sun protection
Several color options, but some may not find a shade that matches as well as they like

customer_reviews.title: Fake product, left side is the original color difference , nasty smell and it made me break out
customer_reviews.text: Beware this product is not real. I have used this product for years when I opened it I immediately noticed it was different it had a very heavy chemical fruity odor , the coverage was too light it made my skin break out .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Major product formula change - consistency, coverage, and color all different
customer_reviews.text: Previously, this product had an out-of-bottle texture that was a little oily, but had great coverage and lasting power, and no smell. I have an extremely fair, neutral skin tone and the BB3 color WAS perfect for me. Now, the texture is airy, pasty, less coverage, far less lasting power, and has a strong and distinct lemongrass scent (citrusy). BB3 is much more yellow than the previous formula, as well. Unfortunately, I didn't realize how pronounced the formula change was until it was too late to return this product. It's a huge disappointment, since true neutral tones are difficult to find (neither yellow nor pink), and with skin cancer running in the family, I always wear SPF foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Sar Swan

customer_reviews.title: New formula is terrible
customer_reviews.text: So I have always loved bb7 , I have been using this for over 4 years. I found out from Jane iredales website they have changed their formula. I absolutely hate it and I thought when I first received the product and was not notified of the new formula I thought it was maybe expired or fake!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good with caveats!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, This is a great SUMMER foundation IF you use a good primer and moisturizer underneath. otherwise, it will be drying and show every pore. Now that we are into fall, it is not so good. I apply with sponge and the rub into the skin. I am 60, and have very few wrinkles, but do have large pores. This does not block them, and a little goes a long way. Much more expensive than anything I have ever used, but I wanted to try it because I know Jane Iredale is good for your skin, and I want to look and feel good about my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tx bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Really good foundation for rosacea and acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea, acne prone skin and finding foundation is really hard until I saw you tuber raves about this one so I bought it in color of BB3 my skin is light with neutral tone I’m more cool tone not warm tone. This matched perfectly and I don’t use full face only to cover spots and under eyes I’m good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Viking2014

customer_reviews.title: Review on BB6 color
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time user of Jane Airedale and I am sure the quality of this is amazing but the color of this (BB6) is hideous. It’s the most abnormal color I’ve ever seen for makeup. Maybe this is a corrective product but as a just full coverage foundation, it’s the worst color ever. I am Hispanic with olive undertones. Unless you are looking for very yellow and heavy full coverage, don’t get BB6. I wish I could return it, I tried one small drop of it. (Prior to ordering I had a professional makeup artist who uses JI exclusively, recommend this color)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Uriburu

customer_reviews.title: Why did they change the formula!!??
customer_reviews.text: I've been using glowtime bb cream for years, and loved it, the only makeup I would wear, but they changed the formula last year and I really don't like it. It' much more sheer so the famous coverage isn't there, and I literally have to apply 2-3 times as much, and it still never looks the same- and it wears off by the end of day, whereas the old formula didn't. I don't know why they had to mess with such a fantastic formula. Sadly, will be looking for something else now, Can't justify spending $48 for this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation, with a note
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it daily; however, it is a bit thick and tends to run yellow, so I simply cut it with another product (sometimes merely my moisturizer, sometimes another bb cream or foundation product). It still gives me great coverage, and actually allows a tube to go much further. I'm in my 50s and have relatively dry skin, few wrinkles but a number of sun spots. I have liked most of the Jane Iredale products I've tried, but this is the only one I use consistently because I've not found better coverage nor finish in another product.
customer_reviews.author: Aggeliki58

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I've come to accept that this product is breaking me out. The first time I tried it, I broke out, but couldn't say for sure this was the culprit. I put it down for awhile and tried it again. I broke out the first day, but kept using it. By the third day, I was in full break out mode. I had hope, but unfortunately (especially for the price) this product isn't for me. Otherwise, it's very full-coverage and a little goes a long way. If you purchase, it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DMoore

customer_reviews.title: Good for normal skins
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice smell and it's thicker than I expected. Unfortunately I had to return it because it wasn't working for my dry skin. It sits on my dry patches, it enhances them, and no damp beauty blender or rose water could fix it. I think it works best for people with normal to slightly oily skin, but it's a rich cream, so probably not ideal for regular oily skin either. The coverage is good, but it needs to be layered.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1st X GREAT BUT 2nd X Ordered Product Perhaps Used? Arrived Opened not good
customer_reviews.text: some of the reviews were scary regarding quality concerns if truly "real" product. My first time ordering I was very pleased so decided to order again. Second order the Box looked a little off. The safety seal was gone and by the looks of the lid -it was used? I am requesting a replacement item. We shall see. This brand of make up has good coverage and is great for sensitive skin. It also has a good sunscreen- better than most. I've used it on and off for years. I switch between this and Chanel foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty mae

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE IF YOU ARE OVER 30
customer_reviews.text: I'm well over 30, and this is my go to for looking my best anytime - it just is like a wonder make-up. I highly recommend and a little bit goes a very long way, so you are looking at 3 - 4 months supply. I use the brushes so that it goes on evenly and minimally.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fab!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I love everything about this product. Typically I wash all of the make up off my face the second I walk through the door, but this I forget I’m even wearing. By far the best foundation I’ve ever used. I have been a fan of her products for years but I’m just now getting around to trying this one. It is not heavy or greasy and once applied it just looks like you have flawless skin. My favorite aspect of this make up is that they make a color light enough for my skin tone. That being said, unless you are extremely fair do not order the lightest shade or you will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: JazeeBelle

customer_reviews.title: Safe all day glow
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday! Once you find your shade it’s perfect! Not greasy or drying! I have combination skin ! I set with hourglass veil under eyes and bare minerals powder foundation all over ! Lasts all day even in summer! ! Still would rather be using my old Victoria Jackson med foundation and powder but in lieu of this is best replacement I’ve found so far!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Siener

customer_reviews.title: Product darker than BB5 normally is & thick and old
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this makeup (same color) for years but this product was TOO DARK. It was thick and old, my make up artist said it had expired. I was very unhappy. I just opened the box this week for a photo shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Peterson Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: User of Jane Iredale
customer_reviews.text: this gave my face an orange undertone. Not pleased. After having surgery to remove skin cancer on nose, Jane Iredale is the recommended product by my dermatologist. I have used the cream before but not had the issue with the undertones. Bought a different number and same thing. Not pleased. Updated....have tried several times since the first week of use thinking maybe just me, but not the case. The undertone is there for both the BB7 and BB9.
customer_reviews.author: CWatson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup I’ve tried and I’ve tried everything from Lancôme, to Marc Jacobs, Este Lauder, Smashbox, YSL, Covergirl,L’Oréal... high end and low end. This is the most light weight and natural I have found! I ran in it to see how it would hold up with sweat and it didn’t budge but it looks like I’m not wearing anything at all!
customer_reviews.author: RusticAx

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a full coverage foundation that would be soothing as it is mineral based with just titanium dioxide as the SPF. What I got was a so-so wanna be BB cream that smells bad, has a weird color (not pink at all, way too yellow), and has almost no coverage. Stick with the BB creams, you'll be happier instead of buying this overpriced foundation. Very surprised, as the Iredale powders (both compact and loose) are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: purpldy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great natural makeup. If you are looking for good coverage in high end "natural" makeup, this is the one to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pa9759

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for make up that give good coverage ( acne and hyper pigmentation) but wasn't too heavy. I am using this every day and fix it with the spray balance so that it doesn't become caky.
customer_reviews.author: Valérie

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bb cream, the color is very natural but the coverage is still great. Has better ingredients than most makeup on the market, especially the one that actually works. It lasts me fine all day, I use a little powder and bronzer with it and it looks and feels great. I do not get the greasy feeling at the end of the day like after some makeup
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Streaky
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to like this. I tried applying it several different ways and no matter what, it got super streaky after an 8 hour shift of work. I used it with primer and set with powder foundation and nothing seemed to help. I personally loved the smell and the coverage was perfect, but it just didn’t hold up for me as I was expecting. It was also pretty yellow, which I was not expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Too thick and the color was off leaving me with an ashy hue. I still will always love/obsess over the Smooth Affair Primer tho. I can't start a day without it and keep it in stock. Hard pass on the mineral BB
customer_reviews.author: Valuable Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Failure
customer_reviews.text: This was one greasy mess. Didn’t dry down. I wouldn’t call this full coverage either. To get to the SPF labeled one would need to use enough of the product, but you’d just end up moving this around the face. If you set this with powder it gets cakey. If you don’t, it’ll just smear. For the price, this was a fail.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love Jane Iredale products but this one was just not for me. Its too heavy and I dont like the matte finish. With a name that has glow in it I thought it would be more highlighting and dewy. I watched the video on her website and it looked like it was going to be perfect for what I wanted since I dont wear foundation or concealer. I just wanted something to even out my skin but this is much too heavy and sinks into my fine lines. I am only 34 and it makes me look older.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sit on skin good. You can see it bead up 😢
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth then beads up and you can see the make up on your face. To bad I really wanted to love this. Guess I will go back to using Elizabeth Arden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cap on tube won’t tighten back on.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product from seller. Doesn’t look like real product. I used twice and now the cap on product tube doesn’t tighten back on. Totally disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie N

customer_reviews.title: Great glow, and perfect coverage without looking fake
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation!! The coverage is perfect. It gives you the right of mound of coverage without being too heavy. I have tried several brands from Laura Metvier, And ILIA to name a few. I always come back to this. It give me a luminous glow, and I look polished. This deserves a perfect 10💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛💛
customer_reviews.author: lotus8

customer_reviews.title: ... and drier than i usually use but can give good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I like Jane Iredale products and have used the mineral powder foundation and the lighter coverage tinted moisturizer. This Glow Time Full Coverage foundation is thicker and drier than i usually use but can give good coverage. When applying it drags along skin due to its dryness so moisturize beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product- minus the lemony scent.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin with large pores and this BB cream stays matte as well as reduces the appearance of my pores. It has a velvety finish and stays on all day, even with my oily skin. The only reason I'm giving this produce 4 stars is the strange lemony scent, it smells like cheap lemon cleaner. I hope the manufacturer will consider making a scentless version for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, didn’t break me out and the color matched fine. It just definitely does not last at all (and I’m not normally super critical of that with makeup - it just won’t even last through an 8 hour desk work day).
customer_reviews.author: Ily

customer_reviews.title: Love Jane Iredale products
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane Iredale products! This is a nice glow but not too shiny. I do use her Smooth Affair has a primer over my moisturizer. I really like this product -- my skin is fair and I do not tan -- so this provides a nice sheen. Lightweight and smooth. A little goes a long way...
customer_reviews.author: SparkeyT1

customer_reviews.title: Change in color
customer_reviews.text: I really love this makeup. Great coverage and super easy application, but in the few months I’ve had this particular tube, I’ve noticed a change in the color. It seems to be more orange now. I don’t use it that often and I certainly don’t ever leave the cap off except to squirt a bit out to use so oxidation couldn’t be the issue. The product may be old but I don’t see any date on it.
customer_reviews.author: thorsten

customer_reviews.title: I love this bb cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this bb cream, the only bb cream give full coverage and doesn't make me break out. Bb7 for winter, bb8 for summer, sometimes I blend them together. The natural sunblock is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Csv

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: I had the original my cousin bought from the company itself. Product I received from amazon was half empty, smells different, and doesn't last as long as the original.
customer_reviews.author: AlissonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This makeup is worth every penny. Take the time ...
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is worth every penny. Take the time to figure out the correct color for your skin tone. That's really important. Very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S Chiles

customer_reviews.title: I love this BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I don't want to run out of it ever. It looks so nice on and it covers sooo good. Its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: i first bought this product a couple years ago in a salon/boutique type shop in connecticut and i loved it! i ordered a refill about a year and a half later and the formula is very different now :( it smells different, not bad just different. but also the product goes on my face looking more orange than it did before which is a bit disappointing. but it’s still a good product with sun protection and decent coverage
customer_reviews.author: hforbes95

customer_reviews.title: Box cream came in crushed
customer_reviews.text: I received this item with two others in the same shipping box. There were no peanuts or other packing material in the box...just the 3 items. The box that the cream came in was completely crushed. Weird since the the shipping box showed no damage whatsoever. The cream seems to be fine and wasn't broken or leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Foundation - Covers Well!
customer_reviews.text: First, it smells lovely. Second, the coverage is perfect and matches my skin tone really well. This is the best foundation I’ve uses so far, and I used Chanel and YSL before purchasing this one. The only complaint I have is the amount of foundation you get per bottle...it’s not much in comparison to price.
customer_reviews.author: AnyaMov

customer_reviews.title: Cool color. Hard to spread.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a better coverage. However, I found it thick and hard to spread. In fact, it was difficult to squeeze out of the exit hole. Perhaps it was not fresh. It just didn't glide on as expected. Color was fine.
customer_reviews.author: TheReader

customer_reviews.title: Cakey splotchy mess
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this, but it was so incredibly heavy on my face even when applied with a beauty blender. It made my acne worse also. Not a fan :(
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Kanonik

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - was a perfect match which is amazing since I purchased online. Applies smoothly and evenly with perfect coverage
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love the coverage of this B
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage of this B.B. cream. The only down I’ve seen from it is I feel like you need to reapply it often to keep full coverage but that was to be expected with all the organic foundations I’ve tried thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells odd
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it’s supposed to do and looks flawless. My only reason for the 4/5 star rating is the smell of the product. It’s not horrible enough to not use it but it does surprise me every time I apply it. For this to be a jane iredale product and have a somewhat pungent odor is a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Neecee

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts, Coverage Not Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Glow Time gave me acne. Also, the coverage is not smooth for combination/dry skin: especially on the areas of dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: C. Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: Favorite foundation! Great coverage but doesn’t feel heavy. Make sure to use moisturizer before applying though.
customer_reviews.author: Divine01

customer_reviews.title: best bb cream!
customer_reviews.text: jane iredale is by far the best brand of makeup. this bb cream has the best coverage and is lightweight and isn't annoying to wear all day. covers any sort of redness and blemishes. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup ever, moisturizes, great coverage and sunblock built in. Doesn't come off on clothing or your husbands shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for years. My favorite. I wish it wasn’t so pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but not enough color choices
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture and coverage of this product but unfortunately they do not offer enough color choices. I have ver fair skin and this color was too yellow for my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Base make up
customer_reviews.text: A little too light weight and the color is not consistent with the other formulations.
customer_reviews.author: Jhay

customer_reviews.title: Does not give full coverage
customer_reviews.text: It does’nt turn my skin orange as most products do but does not cover my brown spots
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is marginal
customer_reviews.text: The formula has changed. It goes on smoother ( no need for a primer) and I am disappointed. I buy it for its matte coverage for this 62 yr old face. It now feels and looks like my $15 foundation from cover girl
customer_reviews.author: carmella lonzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable product I’ve been using for 5 years. I have oily acne prone skin and the lemongrass in this is just perfect. It layers on nicely for problem areas and scarring but never feels cakey
customer_reviews.author: TSG

customer_reviews.title: Not the normal formula
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this for years so I thought I’d try to order it on amazon. Got it opened it and it’s literally the more watered down product ever. It devided and cracked. Returning ASAP. Super upset
customer_reviews.author: Er

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a little better coverage but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Love this BB cream. I found this cream 6 years ago and haven't used any other foundation since. Jane Iredale makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: VCardenas

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this make up forever! I don’t know if they changed their formula but it now smells like a certain bug spray. Still good coverage but the smell is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: *S*

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hard to choose the right color... Looked ok from far away but up close it accentuated my wrinkles and looked too heavy. I've tried cheaper bb creams that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: The product is difficult to move on the face unless you use a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale products are top notch!! I have been using them for years. My only problem is that some of the products have avocado oil in them and I am allergic to avocados. I like this product for covering areas on my skin that have no pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Tappy Toes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I ve been using this for last 6 years!
customer_reviews.author: shirin

customer_reviews.title: I really love this! The coverage is great but if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! The coverage is great but if you have drier skin I recommend applying a serum or oil on your face before applying this.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: I have used this cover up before an love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cover up before an love it....it's a little pricey, but I save it for special times. Don't use it on a regular daily basis because of the cost. Covers so completely.....an it is the best I have ever used...
customer_reviews.author: cathy kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: As good as Dior
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I was using dior BB cream, this is just as good, but you get more volume
customer_reviews.author: A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Received compliments
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review until I was on my second tube. I’m 74 years old & have received a few compliments on my complexion. On even from a May Kay represented. Do using this product plus the make up - it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage Mineral based.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this Jane Iredale makeup Glow Time for years . I like the coverage and that it has SPF 25. Excellent for mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia  A

customer_reviews.title: ... with all of Jane Iredale cosmetics- this stuff is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: As with all of Jane Iredale cosmetics- this stuff is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: LostAngel666

customer_reviews.title: ... when staying at a friends house and thought I loved it. Gives good coverage without feeling too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Tried the product for a night when staying at a friends house and thought I loved it. Gives good coverage without feeling too heavy, but after purchasing for myself and using for a few weeks, my skin looks horrible. Has caused many break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: yellow.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not match what I tried on at a Jane Iredale location. It is very yellow. Smells great, but will need to mix with other products to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney J. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight feeling, not heavy at all. Great coverage. Blends really well. I usually apply my foundation, then let it sit for a few min to settle before applying the rest of my makeup. I get compliments all the time. I'm light olive skin and I use #8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great full coverage makeup
customer_reviews.text: love this makeup. great coverage and now easier to apply! wears well and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: skibumB4

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage but a little hard to blend...would buy again but wish it was a tad thinner....
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ballman

customer_reviews.title: wrong shade
customer_reviews.text: I am the long time customer so last time that I place a buy again order instead of BB8 I received BB6I. it was different shade, very light. I did discard the box so didn't have the packaging to send it back other than that the product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aghassi

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS!  A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation I have ever used! Full coverage, flawless finish!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really love this foundation! Medium coverage that is buildable and doesn’t look cakey at all. It just looks like my skin is having a really good day
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Great to shop at home and receive an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: D dur

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Covers well and feels good on my skin. My doctor recommended this line and I have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: BohoGrammy

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: Living in Las Vegas this with some moisturizer is great for the dry weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company. This is flawless coverage that loyou is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great company. This is flawless coverage that loyou is like you are not wearing foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Best Full Coverage Foundation Out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the BEST full coverage foundation on the market. I have acne prone skin and this helps cover what acne and scars I have while not making me break out more. This covers all my sunspots with ease and stays all day! Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: moriah

customer_reviews.title: Lasts!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an exclusive user of this foundation for 4 years now. As someone with vitiligo, full coverage is important to me. This does that job well, without looking caked on. I do add powdered foundation on top though, to help with the “glow.”
customer_reviews.author: Haley Keech

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I will wear. Great for my skin and flawless coverage
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Britschgi

customer_reviews.title: Not glowy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not full coverage, but what you would expect for a bb cream. NOT glowy at all on my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love This Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and plan to continue to do so. Pricey but well worth it. Doesn't irritate skin, covers well, feels good on.
customer_reviews.author: TisHerself

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation there is. So lightweight that you don't even feel like you're wearing it. Gives a very flawless look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife cause she used it in the past. She likes the product & uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Dave V.

customer_reviews.title: It is just too yellow and light for my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just too yellow and light for my skin tone but the product goes on smooth and lasts all day long.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage and feel of this makeup and it lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is too yellow for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.text: The downside to buying a new cosmetic product online is that you cannot test it. The color is too yellow for my skin tone. It was highly rated for things that I value, as in no animal testing and good ingredients, but I am not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Love the coverage
customer_reviews.text: It is a good foundation and the color was close to my skin tone. It evens out the skin before putting on make-up. I only use drops and spread it evenly like the video and the amount lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: Inspire201

customer_reviews.title: Not good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Made my face so oily and made me break out .
customer_reviews.author: chapiz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Coverage is amazing, you can still look great & protect your skin! It doesn’t feel heavy & the smell is refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Kersten Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Best coverage. This can be layered. It stays on ALL day and night. Best make up I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: MCBMV

customer_reviews.title: No color listing on bottle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this a knockoff. No where on the bottle does it list the color.. only on the box.. very strange
customer_reviews.author: Frank Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great for full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane Iredale products, gives full coverage without feeling heavy also love it has an spf.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kinnelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy, perfect texture. Works great for my skin
customer_reviews.author: eddy midyett

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it covers
customer_reviews.text: i have used this product for a couple of years. I like the way it covers.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Burns

customer_reviews.title: I found this product to be pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be pricey. I have used other bb creams that worked just as well for a much lower cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... thought and it odes run slightly dark (I am pretty fair) but I love that this is a natural ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a different color than I thought. It does run slightly dark (I am pretty fair) but I love that this is a natural product that looks great and contains sunscreen
customer_reviews.author: Ana

product_meta.title: jane iredale Glow Time Full Coverage Mineral BB Cream
product_meta.description:
Color:BB3

Contains SPF 25 or SPF 17* broad spectrum (UVA/UVB) sun protection.*
Water resistant to 40 minutes.
Minimizes the appearance of pores and helps disguise fine lines and wrinkles. 
Smoothes and brightens skin. 
Non-comedogenic, dermatologist and allergy tested.
* SPF 25 - shades: BB1, BB3, BB4, BB5, BB6, BB7 and BB8
SPF 17 - shades: BB9, BB11 and BB12
Reef safe.Wheat Free



BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.
